abstract: Sotiris Ninis (Greek: Σωτήρης Νίνης) born 3 April 1990 is a Greek footballer currently playing for PAOK, on loan from Parma. Ninis is a member of the Greek national team. His FIFA profile claims he "possesses a dizzying range of skills to go with sublime vision, an electrifying change of pace and fearsome long-range shooting skills". He normally plays centrally as a creative midfielder, but can also play on the right.
